title: Provides that juniors and seniors at secondary schools and students at the state and city universities of New York must take a financial literacy course
summary: Provides that juniors and seniors at secondary schools and students at the state and city universities of New York must take a financial literacy course.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring that secondary school students and students enrolled at the state university of New York or the city university of New York complete a financial literacy course
